import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem sum_zeta_pow (p : ℕ) (a : ℤ) {ζ : ℂ} (hζ : IsPrimitiveRoot ζ p) :
    ∑ n in Finset.range p, ζ ^ (a * n) = if (p : ℤ) ∣ a then p else 0 := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• p is a prime number, ζ is a primitive p-th root of unity, and a is an integer [tc_1]
• a ≡ 0 (mod p) [tc_2]
Therefore, we conclude:
• ζ^a = 1 [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
split_ifs with h
  · simp_rw [zpow_mul, (hζ.zpow_eq_one_iff_dvd a).mpr h, one_zpow]
    simp
  · by_cases hp1 : p = 1
    · subst hp1
      simp at h
      contradiction
    · simp_rw [zpow_mul, zpow_coe_nat]
      exact hζ.sum_zpow_of_ne_one h

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem sum_zeta_pow (p : ℕ) (a : ℤ) {ζ : ℂ} (hζ : IsPrimitiveRoot ζ p) :
    ∑ n in Finset.range p, ζ ^ (a * n) = if (p : ℤ) ∣ a then p else 0 := by
  split_ifs with h
  · simp_rw [zpow_mul, (hζ.zpow_eq_one_iff_dvd a).mpr h, one_zpow]
    simp
  · by_cases hp1 : p = 1
    · subst hp1
      simp at h
      contradiction
    · simp_rw [zpow_mul, zpow_coe_nat]
      exact hζ.sum_zpow_of_ne_one h
